data.name: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Pet Pack 2
data.detailed_description:
This content is included with the Season Pass for Warhammer: Chaosbane.

This content pack includes:
  • A Flamespyre Phoenix
  • An Ancestor Dwarf ghost
  • A hunting hawk
  • A sprite

Save money on bonus content for Warhammer: Chaosbane by purchasing the Season Pass.
data.about_the_game:
This content is included with the Season Pass for Warhammer: Chaosbane.

This content pack includes:

data.short_description: This content is included with the Season Pass for Warhammer: Chaosbane. This pack gives you access to new emblematic pets from the Warhammer Fantasy universe.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bits version of Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3 or AMD Phenom™ II X3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 with 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bits version of Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 or AMD FX 8150
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 with 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
